name: gentle kisses beanie
sizes_available: 8 sizes from newborn to adult large
notes:
introducing the unisex gentle kisses beanie crochet pattern - the perfect way to top off your next crochet project! 
whether you’re a confident beginner looking to expand your skills or an experienced crafter looking for a challenging new pattern, you’ll love this gorgeous and easy-to-learn beanie pattern.

the gentle kisses beanie is worked in rounds, starting at the top and ending with the brim - for a hat that’s free of pesky seams. not to mention, the stitches used create an almost invisible join at the end of each round, making it look smooth and polished. to make sure your hat comes out perfect, sizes are listed at the end of each round so you can easily check gauge or customize the number of rounds you use to increase or decrease the size.

you'll love the way this beanie looks and feels! its unique texture and perfect fit are sure to make it a winter staple. and for those looking to spruce up their projects even further, add any embellishments that suit your style – like tiny pompoms, buttons, chenille, or even crochet flowers. our 4 year old nephew even chose a pompom from our personal stash to match his hat, so the possibilities are truly endless!

pick up the unisex gentle kisses hat pattern today and get ready to kick off your cold weather crafting! with its combination of simplicity and beauty, it’s sure to have you coming back for more.

❤ layout: 
my patterns all share the same layout which is easy to read and easy to find important information you need, such as materials needed, sizing information, gauge information, and special stitches used as well as how to do them.  these stitches often come with an accompanying video for further clarification.

❤ size:  
this pattern is written for 8 sizes: newborn, up to 6 months, 6-12 months, 1-3 years, 4-10 years, teen / adult small, adult medium and adult large.

❤ materials:
•	#4 weight yarn of your choosing – yardage is between 55 and 190 yards depending on size..
•	5mm hook
•	stitch markers (optional)
•	scissors
•	tapestry needle
